string.name: module_desc
string.value: 鸿蒙应用市场数据看板

string.name: simple_share_label
string.value: 按已有信息投稿到看板

string.name: text_sharing_description
string.value: Provides cross-application sharing examples such as texts and links.

string.name: share_selection_mode
string.value: Switching between single-choice mode and batch mode

string.name: share_preview_mode
string.value: The default mode (preview card) and preview mode switch are implemented.

string.name: share_excluded_abilities_print
string.value: Enables the exclusion of "print" operations from the action area

string.name: share_close_listening
string.value: The function of listening to the event of disabling the sharing panel is implemented.

string.name: dismiss_description_1
string.value: Developers can register a dismiss event listener for the sharing panel to close using the on method.

string.name: dismiss_description_2
string.value: This event is triggered when the sharing panel is closed.

string.name: dismiss_description_3
string.value: Developers can cancel registered event listeners by calling the off method.

string.name: shareCompleted_description_1
string.value: Developers can register a shareCompleted event listener to monitor user sharing operations using the on method.

string.name: shareCompleted_description_2
string.value: When a user triggers a share, the event listener returns the target application or action that the user is sharing.

string.name: shareCompleted_description_3
string.value: Developers can use this callback to obtain the event of successful user sharing and the target application for data statistics.

string.name: shareCompleted_description_4
string.value: Developers can cancel registered event listeners by calling the off method.

string.name: access_model_title
string.value: Two Access Modes for Host App

string.name: full_model
string.value: Directly invoke the system sharing panel.

string.name: full_description
string.value: Applies to Huawei-developed applications and third-party partners who have no business requirements for the sharing area. Directly use the system panel to reduce development costs.

string.name: half_model
string.value: Partner self-development and sharing capabilities & Add a system sharing entry

string.name: half_description
string.value: Applicable to third-party partners who have business requirements in the sharing area or have their own unique business logic.

string.name: immersive_title
string.value: I saw the only landform that China doesn't have, the fjord landform.

string.name: knock_white_title
string.value: White card up and down layout

string.name: send_only_description
string.value: The "sendOnly" attribute is typically used in gaming and social applications. For example, when both parties are in a game team room, there might be a conflict when attempting to invite the other party to join by simply touching. In such cases, setting the "sendOnly" attribute can prompt the user to try again after one party has exited.

string.name: delay_description
string.value: When receiving a tap callback, if the preview image needs to be downloaded from the cloud, you can first call the share interface to initiate the sharing process. Once the preview image is downloaded, use updateShareData to update the preview image.

string.name: sandbox_description
string.value: By lightly tapping the window of a PC/2in1 device with a mobile phone, you can directly access the application sandbox.

string.name: sandbox_account
string.value: Touch the phone and PC/2in1 device together, which only

string.name: sandbox_note
string.value: This example only supports receiving one image, which is configured through the capabilities field.

string.name: pcKnock_reject_title
string.value: PC multi-window refuses this sharing session

string.name: pcKnock_reject_description
string.value: PC multi-window refuses this sharing session

string.name: knock_no_title
string.value: When only preview image parameters are transferred, the image-only layout is used.

string.name: knock_image_upper_limit
string.value: When the aspect ratio of the preview image is less than 1:1, the immersive large-card layout is used.

string.name: knock_image_lower_limit
string.value: When the aspect ratio of the preview image is greater than 1:1, the top-down layout of the white card is used.

string.name: share_timer
string.value: When receiving a tap callback, prepare the data to be shared within 3 seconds and trigger the sending using the share method.

string.name: reject_timer
string.value: When a touch callback is received, if the data is not ready to be shared within 3 seconds, use this method to reject the sharing and provide the reason to the user.

string.name: knock_precautions_1
string.value: 1. When the page to be shared is displayed, use the harmonyShare.on() method to register the touch listening event.

string.name: knock_precautions_2
string.value: 2. When leaving the page to be shared, use the harmonyShare.off() method to cancel the touch listening event.

string.name: knock_precautions_3
string.value: 3. When the application returns to the background, use the harmonyShare.off() method to cancel the touch listening event.

string.name: gesture_click
string.value: click to enable grab & drop monitoring

string.name: gesture_precautions_1
string.value: 1. Turn on the Air Transfer switch to experience it. Go to Settings > System > Shortcuts & gestures > Grab & drop

string.name: only_pc_supported
string.value: Please experience using the PC/2in1 device.

string.name: tap_to_share_tips
string.value: Prompt: When users enter an interface or scenario that supports tap-to-share functionality, providing appropriate guidance and prompts can effectively enhance their willingness to share.
